0:
[couchdb]
single_node = true
max_document_size = 50000000

[chttpd]
require_valid_user = true
max_http_request_size = 4294967296
enable_cors = true

[chttpd_auth]
require_valid_user = true
authentication_redirect = /_utils/session.html

[httpd]
WWW-Authenticate = Basic realm="couchdb"
bind_address = 0.0.0.0

[cors]
origins = app://obsidian.md, capacitor://localhost, http://localhost
credentials = true
headers = accept, authorization, content-type, origin, referer
methods = GET, PUT, POST, HEAD, DELETE
max_age = 3600

mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit
